racket.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The old machine used to make an awful racket.
racket.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a dishonest way of obtaining money, such as by threatening people or selling them illegal goods
racket.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Police believe he is involved in an international smuggling racket.
racket.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a specially shaped piece of wood or metal that you use for hitting the ball in games such as tennis, that has a circle filled with tight strings at one end
racket.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a dishonest or illegal way of obtaining money
racket.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He had used his position to set up a cocaine racket.
